attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to keep all the memorabilia items including photos, letters and football t-shirts ( Newcastle and Manchester united) at the two separate fatal car-crash sites on Rotary way, Amble, Northumberland. (A1068)
To all the friends and family somewhere to go and time to grieve. let them rest in peace!
never forgotten Steven Robinson aged 19
                          Shaun Smith aged 19
                          David Jones aged 38
